snippet: The acknowledgment that United States military forces have taken “direct action” in those countries opens the window further into the president’s secret war on terrorists.
abstract: Pres Obama publicly acknowledges for the first time that United States military forces are engaged in several operations against terrorist groups in Somalia and Yemen, further opening the window into his secret war on terrorism.
lead_paragraph: The acknowledgment that United States military forces have taken “direct action” in those countries opens the window further into the president’s secret war on terrorists.
